feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r JCalc(JCalc) :m LANG(LANG) :g [1,1] : PT_BR(PT_BR) : EN(EN) :m MENU(MENU) :m FILE(FILE) :m HELP(HELP) :o EDIT(EDIT) :o SAVE(SAVE) :o LOOKANDFEEL(LOOKANDFEEL) :g [1,1] : Metal(Metal) : System(System) : Motif(Motif) : GTK(GTK) : Windows(Windows) :o ANALYZER(ANALYZER) :o PERFORMANCE(PERFORMANCE) :m DEVICE(DEVICE) :g [1,1] : Z6(Z6) : Milestone(Milestone) : PC(PC) :o COMMA(COMMA)
